product.name: Almay One Coat Thickening Mascara
product.description: Almay One Coat Thickening Mascara gives you up to 100% thicker lashes in one smooth, even coat. This volumizing formula builds lashes double thick in one quick, clump-free application. Nourishing formula is infused with aloe and vitamin B5 to help keep lashes conditioned and silky. Extra gentle, non irritating formula.Hypoallergenic. Ophthalmologist tested.
